title: Nut Dish And Cover, "Ambassador", 1926
dimensions:
H x diam. (overall): 13.8 x 7.8 cm (5 7/16 x 3 1/16 in.)
H x W x D (base): 6.9 x 8 x 8 cm (2 11/16 x 3 1/8 x 3 1/8 in.)
H x W x D (top): 7 x 8 x 8 cm (2 3/4 x 3 1/8 x 3 1/8 in.)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan
description: Thin-walled, clear glass; a) hemispherical bowl supported by thin stem on flat, circular foot; b) domed cover with spherical knop on stem; rim of cover retracted, to fit snuggly in bowl.

tombstone.epitaph:
Nut Dish And Cover, "Ambassador", 1926.
1926. Glass. Museum purchase through gift of Georgiana L. McClellan. 1958-98-25-a,b.
